hibernate4:generate-ddl

Full name:

de.akquinet.maven.hibernate4:hibernate4-maven-plugin:0.2-SNAPSHOT:generate-ddl

Description:

(no description)

Attributes:

  • Requires a Maven project to be executed.
  • Requires dependency resolution of artifacts in scope: compile.

Optional Parameters

Name Type Since Description
create boolean - (no description)
Default value is: true.
User property is: hibernate4.generateCreateDdl.
createFilename String - (no description)
Default value is: create.sql.
User property is: hibernate4.createFilename.
delimiter String - (no description)
Default value is: ;.
User property is: hibernate4.delimiter.
drop boolean - (no description)
Default value is: true.
User property is: hibernate4.generateDropDdl.
dropFilename String - (no description)
Default value is: drop.sql.
User property is: hibernate4.dropFilename.
encoding String - (no description)
Default value is: UTF-8.
User property is: hibernate4.encoding.
outputDirectory File - (no description)
Default value is: ${project.build.directory}/generated-resources/ddl.
User property is: hibernate4.outputDirectory.
persistenceUnitName String - (no description)
User property is: hibernate4.persistenceUnitName.

Parameter Details

create:

(no description)
  • Type: boolean
  • Required: No
  • User Property: hibernate4.generateCreateDdl
  • Default: true

createFilename:

(no description)
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: No
  • User Property: hibernate4.createFilename
  • Default: create.sql

delimiter:

(no description)
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: No
  • User Property: hibernate4.delimiter
  • Default: ;

drop:

(no description)
  • Type: boolean
  • Required: No
  • User Property: hibernate4.generateDropDdl
  • Default: true

dropFilename:

(no description)
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: No
  • User Property: hibernate4.dropFilename
  • Default: drop.sql

encoding:

(no description)
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: No
  • User Property: hibernate4.encoding
  • Default: UTF-8

outputDirectory:

(no description)
  • Type: java.io.File
  • Required: No
  • User Property: hibernate4.outputDirectory
  • Default: ${project.build.directory}/generated-resources/ddl

(no description)
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: No
